<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DeadInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push this on last so that it gets deleted after all the others.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DeadInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(AI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the new allocation value so that we can check for needed spills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to make room to insert a spill after initial PHIs, but before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catchswitch instruction. Placing it before violates the requirement that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catchswitch, like all other EHPads must be the first nonPHI in a block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split away catchswitch into a separate block and insert in its place:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cleanuppad &lt;InsertPt&gt; cleanupret.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cleanupret instruction will act as an insert point for the spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/#aedc5ca2a4ef6009dc69a410d60c7eeaf"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/#aedc5ca2a4ef6009dc69a410d60c7eeaf">splitBeforeCatchSwitch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchswitchinst">CatchSwitchInst</a> &#42;CatchSwitch) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrentBlock = CatchSwitch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBlock = CurrentBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(CatchSwitch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CurrentBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CleanupPad =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cleanuppadinst/#afa8a6a49b80d4ca3bd0881fe4383c511">CleanupPadInst::Create</a>(CatchSwitch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchswitchinst/#a74d56dd1a8531d108c9b4883bfff61a6">getParentPad</a>(), &#123;&#125;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CurrentBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CleanupRet =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cleanupreturninst/#a7e19664720f1c4693b788b018d08758c">CleanupReturnInst::Create</a>(CleanupPad, NewBlock, CurrentBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CleanupRet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use a pointer use visitor to track how an alloca is being used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The goal is to be able to answer the following three questions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Should this alloca be allocated on the frame instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Could the content of the alloca be modified prior to CoroBegin, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      would require copying the data from the alloca to the frame after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      CoroBegin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 Are there any aliases created for this alloca prior to CoroBegin, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      used after CoroBegin. In that case, we will need to recreate the alias</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      after CoroBegin based off the frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To answer question 1, we track two things:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   A. List of all BasicBlocks that use this alloca or any of the aliases of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   the alloca. In the end, we check if there exists any two basic blocks that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cross suspension points. If so, this alloca must be put on the frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   B. Whether the alloca or any alias of the alloca is escaped at some point,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   either by storing the address somewhere, or the address is used in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   function call that might capture. If it&#39;s ever escaped, this alloca must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   put on the frame conservatively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To answer quetion 2, we track through the variable MayWriteBeforeCoroBegin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whenever a potential write happens, either through a store instruction, a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function call or any of the memory intrinsics, we check whether this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction is prior to CoroBegin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To answer question 3, we track the offsets of all aliases created for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alloca prior to CoroBegin but used after CoroBegin. std::optional is used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be able to represent the case when the offset is unknown (e.g. when you have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a PHINode that takes in different offset values). We cannot handle unknown</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offsets and will assert. This is the potential issue left out. An ideal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// solution would likely require a significant redesign.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a5a7dd3f145f4927fa6bd942c6fcad594">AllocaUseVisitor</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor</a>&lt;AllocaUseVisitor&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a1cdcb9429de4a16696918483aac058a6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a1cdcb9429de4a16696918483aac058a6">Base</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor&lt;AllocaUseVisitor&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a5a7dd3f145f4927fa6bd942c6fcad594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a5a7dd3f145f4927fa6bd942c6fcad594">AllocaUseVisitor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac5b2513c27d0e8fe9a9214eb9fe99a7b">DL</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac5b2513c27d0e8fe9a9214eb9fe99a7b">DL</a>), DT(DT), CoroShape(CoroShape), Checker(Checker),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ShouldUseLifetimeStartInfo(ShouldUseLifetimeStartInfo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anycorosuspendinst">AnyCoroSuspendInst</a> &#42;SuspendInst : CoroShape.CoroSuspends)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CoroSuspendBBs.insert(SuspendInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#ad71ead87ca8f3fc5edfb6173a970f792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#ad71ead87ca8f3fc5edfb6173a970f792">visitStoreInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Regardless whether the alias of the alloca is the value operand or the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer operand, we need to assume the alloca is been written.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    handleMayWrite(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getValueOperand() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac1e78f8a1f204bed8ad26681199fa16b">U</a>-&gt;get())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are storing the pointer into a memory location, potentially escaping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As an optimization, we try to detect simple cases where it doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually escape, for example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %ptr = alloca ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %addr = alloca ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store %ptr, %addr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %x = load %addr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If %addr is only used by loading from it, we could simply treat %x as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another alias of %ptr, and not considering %ptr being escaped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSimpleStoreThenLoad = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;AI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AllocaInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getPointerOperand());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the memory location we are storing to is not an alloca, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could be an alias of some other memory locations, which is difficult</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to analyze.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// StoreAliases contains aliases of the memory location stored into.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> StoreAliases = &#123;AI&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StoreAliases.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = StoreAliases.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac1e78f8a1f204bed8ad26681199fa16b">U</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are loading from the memory location, we are creating an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alias of the original pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac1e78f8a1f204bed8ad26681199fa16b">U</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#a0ea2fc89be409baf64d5a935f6b02f28">enqueueUsers</a>(&#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">            handleAlias(&#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are overriding the memory location, the pointer certainly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// won&#39;t escape.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;S = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac1e78f8a1f204bed8ad26681199fa16b">U</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShouldUseLifetimeStartInfo&#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">mutable</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt; ShouldLiveOnFrame&#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> computeShouldLiveOnFrame()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If lifetime information is available, we check it first since it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more precise. We look at every pair of lifetime.start intrinsic and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// every basic block that uses the pointer to see if they cross suspension</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// points. The uses cover both direct uses as well as indirect uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShouldUseLifetimeStartInfo &amp;&amp; !LifetimeStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#af8a50544090e81ac83601aff8f4b0142">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is no explicit lifetime.end, then assume the address can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cross suspension points.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LifetimeEndBBs.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is a path from a lifetime.start to a suspend without a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding lifetime.end, then the alloca&#39;s lifetime persists</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beyond that suspension point and the alloca must go on the frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">llvm::SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Worklist(LifetimeStartBBs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a828f756cea7deec4b58080a7e499137c">isManyPotentiallyReachableFromMany</a>(Worklist, CoroSuspendBBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             &amp;LifetimeEndBBs, &amp;DT))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addresses are guaranteed to be identical after every lifetime.start so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we cannot use the local stack if the address escaped and there is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suspend point between lifetime markers. This should also cover the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case of a single lifetime.start intrinsic in a loop with suspend point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PI.isEscaped()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> : LifetimeStarts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : LifetimeStarts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Checker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#ad7b0b1b552021b1e8f080f4e79253853">hasPathOrLoopCrossingSuspendPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getParent(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getParent()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Ideally the isEscaped check should come at the beginning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However there are a few loose ends that need to be fixed first before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we can do that. We need to make sure we are not over-conservative, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the data accessed in-between await&#95;suspend and symmetric transfer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is always put on the stack, and also data accessed after coro.end is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always put on the stack (esp the return object). To fix that, we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1) Potentially treat sret as nocapture in calls</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2) Special handle the return object and put it on the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  3) Utilize lifetime.end intrinsic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PI.isEscaped())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;U1 : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;U2 : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Checker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a184a65eb9ac1cd8093ea44d3490b3e70">isDefinitionAcrossSuspend</a>(&#42;U1, U2))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleMayWrite(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(CoroShape.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape/#abfb56acef5d60fefb2edc417f0bfbda0">CoroBegin</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MayWriteBeforeCoroBegin = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, do a quick rewrite of the alloca and then add spills of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the rewritten value. The rewrite doesn&#39;t invalidate anything in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Spills because the other alloca intrinsics have no other operands</span></CodeLine>
